description: A refreshing blend of fruits with a raspberry revelation at the end!  A great brunch appetiser that is served with lovely Summer fruits & dried rose petals.
name: Raspberry Revelation Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place frozen raspberries, 1 banana, half of the aloe drink & 1 pear in a blender. Blend till smooth. Pour out the mix evenly into 4 glasses & place in the fridge.

Add the rest of the aloe drink (200 ml) to the blender and the remaining fruit (remembering to keep aside 8 strawberries for serving). Blend until smooth. Remove the glasses from the fridge & evenly spoon the blend into the middle of the glasses until a new layer of colour forms. Just pouring the blend can lose this effect.
Remove the leaves from the serving strawberries & cut them in halves. Place 4 halves gently on top of the blend in each of the glasses.
Place the glasses in the fridge until serving. Sprinkle the dried rose petals evenly on top of the glasses just before serving. Serve with long spoons & a bowl of blueberries & blackberries.

Enjoy this refreshing blend for brunch, breakfast, as an appetiser, or for dessert. A refreshing healthy summer blend that can be enjoyed by the whole family. You will love it when you get to the bottom of the glass & find the raspberry revelation!
